OSEA Ocean Cleansing Mudd

Brand: OSEA

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water / Aqua / Eau, Decyl Glucoside, Glycerin, Fucus Vesiculosus Powder, Sea Silt, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Sorbitan Olivate, Propanediol, Sodium Lauroyl Oat Amino Acids, Laminaria Digitata Powder, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Rosmarinus

Propanediol, Sodium Lauroyl Oat Amino Acids, Laminaria Digitata Powder, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Tocopherol, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil,

Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Tocopherol, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid

Directions: Dispense a small amount of OCEAN CLEANSING MUDD onto your fingers. Apply evenly to face and neck, and massage into skin, then rinse with warm water. For deeper cleansing, massage with facial brush.

Warnings: n/a

Warnings: n/a

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
